nodes.text: Trent was a male captain in the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars. He was in command of the Acclamator-class assault ship Halleck when it was assigned to Jedi Master Mace Windu in 22 BBY. During a mission to extract Windu and his Padawan Depa Billaba, the Halleck was attacked by droid starfighters, and the captain was injured. His subordinate, Commander Urhal, was able to withdraw the ship to Republic space.
Trent was first mentioned in Matthew Stover's 2003 novel Shatterpoint.
